name: VSTest
description: Run tests with VS test runner

inputs.name: testAssembly
inputs.label: Test Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test binaries to run tests on.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**\*test*.dll;-:**\obj\**` for all dlls with test in name while excluding files in any sub-directory named obj.

inputs.name: vsTestLocation
inputs.label: VSTest Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to VSTest.  It defaults to searching for latest version.
